SoulmateTechs
NameAccDmgGutsDownCritGutsUseEffPow/IntRange
XXXX BlockBEED28DefenseUp POWany
XXXX BlockBEED20DefenseUp POWany
XXXX BlockBEED28DefenseUp INTany
XXXX BlockBEED20DefenseUp INTany
XXX SmashBBDD42AtackPOWany
XXX SmashBCDD36AtackPOWany
XXX SmashBADD42AttackINTany
XXXX CureSEEE35HealPOWany
XXXX CureSEEE35HealINTany


XXXX is the name of the monster who taught you the move
There isn't a lot of rhyme or reason on whether you will get POW or INT based, or what kind of move you will learn.

At least, not without sitting down and mapping out which breed wild monsters give what moves. There are more important things to do now, but anyone who's working on making friends, feel free to plug away at that research.
